message.content:
cs.PL, cs.LO, cs.DS, cs.SE, cs.FL

Reasoning: 

1. cs.PL (Programming Languages): The paper introduces a new functional language called λ Actor and presents an abstract interpretation framework for it. This falls under the scope of programming languages research.

2. cs.LO (Logic in Computer Science): The paper formalizes an abstract model of λ Actor programs called Actor Communicating System (ACS) which has a natural interpretation as a vector addition system. This involves the use of logic and falls under the scope of logic in computer science.

3. cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms): The paper presents a flow-based, abstract semantics of λ Actor programs, which involves the use of data structures and algorithms.

4. cs.SE (Software Engineering): The paper presents an approach to verify safety properties of concurrent programs automatically, which falls under the scope of software engineering.

5. cs.FL (Formal Languages and Automata Theory): The paper presents a formal model of λ Actor programs called Actor Communicating System (ACS), which has a natural interpretation as a vector addition system. This falls under the scope of formal languages and automata theory.
